Machine learning is a type of artificial intelligence that enables computer systems to automatically improve their performance on a specific task without being explicitly programmed. It involves the use of algorithms and statistical models to learn patterns and insights from data, which can then be used to make predictions or decisions about new data. Some common applications of machine learning include image recognition, natural language processing, and predictive analytics.
